title: Bitcoin gathers itself ready for the next big push
description: Bitcoin is traversing sideways, consolidating and gaining strength ready for the big push towards the very important $48,000 level. With the Spot Bitcoin ETF likely to be announced early in the new year, expect high volatility.

title: Cryptocurrency scammers exploit MS Drainer to siphon $59 million: Details
description: Scammers have orchestrated a sophisticated operation using a cryptocurrency wallet-draining service known as “MS Drainer,” extracting a staggering $59 million from approximately 63,210 victims over the past nine months.
